title: Used Cars Simulator
description:
In Used Cars Simulator , you’ll fix up cars, put them up for sale, grow your business in an old shed, drive around an abandoned city, drink beer, and wander the desert with a metal detector . And it all starts when you meet a beautiful woman in a red dress at your favorite bar Are you in? Aviassembly
FIND A GOOD OFFER
In Used Cars Simulator , you’ll learn how to make money by trading cars. First, find a good deal. Check the car’s condition, negotiate the price, and if everything looks good – just buy it.
FIX THE CAR
Fix the dents, order and install missing parts, wash the car, repaint it, and put it up for sale. If it wasn’t yours, you’d probably want to buy it yourself!
